articles.title: Scientists discover 100-million-year-old fossil flowers preserved in amber - CGTN
articles.description: An international research team led by Chinese scientists has discovered 100-million-year-old fossil flowers preserved in amber, providing evidence for the study of the evolution of flowering plants in Southeast Asia and tectonic plate movement.
articles.content:
